key_features: Enjoy 1.7% limitless cashback across all your local retail spend including groceries, insurance, as well as big purchases such as home furnishings, electronics and luxury shopping.
Enjoy 1.7% limitless cashback across all your overseas spend.
Enjoy 0.3% limitless cashback on generally excluded spend such as Grab mobile wallet top-up, Charity, Education, Government, Healthcare, Utilities and other Professional services.
No minimum spend and no spend exclusions ("No spend exclusions" does not include NETS transactions made with the UOB Absolute Cashback Card)

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
overseas_spending: Enjoy 1.7% limitless cashback across all your overseas spend.
petrol: Enjoy up to 14% fuel discount at Shell Enjoy up to 15% fuel discount at SPC
cash_back: Enjoy 1.7% limitless cashback across all your overseas spend and local retail spend including groceries, insurance, as well as big purchases such as home furnishings, electronics and luxury shopping.
Enjoy 0.3% limitless cashback on generally excluded spend such as Grab mobile wallet top-up, school fees, healthcare and government services.
entertainment: 1.7% Limitless Cashback on Entertainment including recurring subscription such as Netflix, Disney+ and more
shopping: 1.7% Limitless Cashback on Shopping, especially for big purchases such as luxury shoppings, home furnishings and more

eligibility: MoneySmart Exclusive Promotion is valid from 15-March-2025 to 31-March-2025
UOB Online Promotion is valid from 01-March-2025 to 31-March-2025
The promotion is only applicable for new-to-UOB credit card customers only.
Customers need to apply through MoneySmart to be eligible
Log into your MoneySmart account and submit a claim by 14th April 2025 in order to qualify for our MoneySmart Exclusive offers.

fees.supplementary_card_fee: 1st supplementary card free; $98.10 for subsequent cards
